patterns_discovered: Dynamic status management for restaurant tables
Modal-based form for table CRUD operations
QR code generation and download functionality
Dark mode and responsive UI design
gotchas_discovered: Complex state management with multiple useState hooks
Potential performance issues with multiple async operations
Heavy reliance on client-side database interactions
Lack of server-side validation in form submission
recommendations: Consider using React Query or SWR for data fetching
Create reusable hooks for database operations
Add unit and integration tests for table management logic
